reviewText: A different twist to the horrors of Nazi Germany

This series of 4 films, 1 hour each, is a high quality documentary about the critical role scientists played in the Holocaust. More specifically, the film makes clear that Darwinian eugenics played a central role. When the film Expelled was released one major objection to the film was the claim that a close connection existed between the Holocaust and Darwinism. This film used interviews from the doctors who served in the camp as well as the major Holocaust scholars to document that fact. Spellbinding and very educational.
